message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. This is a fair price that reflects its value. Let me know if you're interested in closing the deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm still not able to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $875,000. This is a fair price that allows both of us to walk away happy. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. However, I am unable to go above $850,000. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
